lead_paragraph: A year after being named president of Medgar Evers College, William Pollard is being accused by professors and others as dictatorial and detached from the community.
snippet: A year after being named president of Medgar Evers College, William Pollard is being accused by professors and others as dictatorial and detached from the community.

headline.main: For a College President, the Criticisms Pile Up
headline.seo: President of Medgar Evers College Is Criticized
headline.print_headline: For a College President, The Criticisms Pile Up
